name: Soul Blazer (itch)
description:
Soul Blazer

It was just a mere bunny you stole in your lord's forest. But in these lands, thiefs are punished by a swift justice : all you limbs were cutted and thrown away in the castle.

Despite this, your soul survived and is now trapped in this horrible realm. You need to escape. But to keep the flame lit, only your left hand remain.

Will you manage to find all your limbs and complete the incantation to free your soul
before all you fingers are consumed ?

Made with Unity.
All the sprites were drawn with care using Piskel.
Sounds from FreeSound.

Controls :

QZER/AWER and Space to lit fingers
Mouse to moove hand



Main develeoper : Lukas Tamayo
Game design and aditional coding : Eleonore Schiltz
Art : Raphael Brito
